entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
